title: Please Help to find font
content:
Hello,

Can you please Kindly advice me with the correct font face.  
for the word " St. Georges".

thanking you in anticipation.

regards,  
Hasnain

Font: 

 Fontin Sans 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131928/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: hasnain125

comments.content:
Thanks Ryuk,

I know this not there new logo. I do have the Fontin Sans.

But someone, who has done the previous work for their design has messed up with there font face & all their embroideries and other design are of the old one, therefore I am looking at old and alphabet "G" is what making mess atm.
